I am Satheesh

About

Hello, I am Satheesh Davidson, senior software engineer from India currently based on Dubai. Having a B.S and M.S in Computer science & 6+ years of comprehensive experience in IT industry. I am also a Certified Kubernetees Administrator.

I specialize in back-end, more focused on designing distributed systems with scalability in mind.

I have majorly worked with Microsoft technologies in the past such as C#, .NET framework, ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, MS SQL Server etc. Had touched on Java, C, C++, various JavaScript frameworks in college days. Currently learning k8s, Go and other interesting technologies.

In my free time, I read technical blogs/articles and books, watching movies or playing FIFA.
